description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from theBalancedBriefNLtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

items.title: ICE Seeks Cyber Upgrade to Better Surveil and Investigate Its Employees
items.description: The agency plans to renew a sweeping cybersecurity contract that includes expanded employee monitoring as the government escalates leak investigations...

items.title: 7 Best Cheap Phones (2025), Tested and Reviewed
items.description: There’s little reason to pay top dollar for a smartphone. These iPhones and Android devices—ranging from $100 to $600—stood up to WIRED’s testing.

items.title: Why British politicians are flocking to American tech giants

items.title: Instacart to pay $60M to settle FTC claims it deceived consumers
items.description: The federal agency alleged Instacart misled consumers with unlawful tactics, causing them to pay higher fees while also denying refunds.

items.title: ChatGPT’s mobile app hits new milestone of $3B in consumer spending
items.description: ChatGPT has reached $3B in lifetime mobile consumer spending in just 31 months, faster than TikTok and major streaming apps.

items.title: Thuma Classic Bed Frame Review: Functional Meets Fabulous
items.description: This fashionable bed frame eliminates the need for tools during setup, instead using a Tetris-like stacking process.

items.title: The Ultra-Realistic AI Face Swapping Platform Driving Romance Scams

items.title: Pickle Robot adds Tesla veteran as first CFO
items.description: Jeff Evanson recently joined Pickle Robot as the company's first CFO as the startup has allegedly expanded its partnership with UPS.

items.title: ChatGPT launches an app store, lets developers know it’s open for business
items.description: OpenAI is looking to populate its flagship chatbot with a host of new user experiences.
